response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and significance, worth $800,000 to you, and I am confident it will enrich your life in countless ways. To make this acquisition possible, I propose a price that reflects its true worth while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing the product for $750,000. This offer is not only a testament to the product's value but also an extension of my commitment to making high-quality items accessible to discerning buyers like yourself. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 750000}
